name: cphnmcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4))

stmt.origin: ffvelrnda(c1, c2, c3, c4, wcel(c0, ccph))
stmt.pretty: ffvelrnda(c1, c2, c3, c4, c0 ∈ CPreHil)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wf(c3, c2, c4))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` c1)∈ c4)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil →(c3 : c2 → c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wf(c3, c2, c4))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` c1)∈ c4)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil →(c3 : c2 → c4))

stmt.origin: cphnmf(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6)
stmt.pretty: cphnmf(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wf(c3, c2, c4))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(cip, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cnm, c0))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c6))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CPreHil →(c3 : c2 → c4))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c5 =(· ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(norm ` c0)
⊣ c6 =(Scalar ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(Base ` c6)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(cip, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cnm, c0))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c6))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` c1)∈ c4)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c5 =(· ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(norm ` c0)
⊣ c6 =(Scalar ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(Base ` c6)

comment: The norm of a vector is a member of the scalar field in a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Oct-2015.)
